form.name: general_consideration
form.page_subtitle: CWC Counselling: Pre-referral Treatments in Clinics> General Consideration

field.name: Explain to mother/caregiver why the drug is given to child
Determine the dose of drugs appropriate for the child’s weight (or age)
Demonstrate how to measure a dose
Watch mother/caregiver practise measuring a dose by herself
Ask mother/caregiver to give the first dose to child
Explain carefully how to give drug, then label and package drug. If more than drug will be given, collect, count and package each drug separately
Explain that all tablets or syrup must be used to finish the course of treatment, even if child gets better
Check mother’s/caregiver’s understanding before she leaves
